original_text: Solomon offered burnt offerings to the Lord on the altar that he had built. The altar was outside the entrance of the temple.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 낭실 앞에 쌓은 여호와의 제단 위에 여호와께 번제를 드리되

sentences.original_text: Solomon offered burnt offerings to the Lord
on the altar that he had built
The altar was outside the entrance
